name: Cookie Clicker (itch) (GrowtopiaFli)
description: Cookie Clicker!!! A Simulation Game Made By Me. You Must Collect Enough Points To Earn More Points. For Example 1 Click = 1 Point After 20 Points 1 Click = 5 Points. Collect As Much Points To Convert It To Coins. You Can Use Coins To Buy Keys Of Rooms. When You Unlock The Room You Get A Trophy Inside It. Your Job Is To Buy All The Trophies To Win!!!
